defaultValue.description: The value of the select when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the Select
defaultValue.description_zh: 最初呈现时选择的值。在不需要控制 Select 的状态时使用

:v-model.description: The controlled value of the Select Should be binded-with with v-model.
:v-model.description_zh: Select 的受控值应与 v-model 绑定。

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the select when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 最初呈现选择时的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

open.description: The controlled open state of the Select Must be binded-with with v-model.
open.description_zh: Select 的受控打开状态必须与 v-model 绑定。

dir.description: The reading direction of the select when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 选择的阅读方向（如果适用）。如果省略，则全局继承自 DirectionProvider 或采用 LTR（从左到右）读取模式。

name.description: The name of the Select Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.
name.description_zh: Select Submitted 的名称及其所属表单作为名称/值对的一部分。

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with Select
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则阻止用户与 Select 交互

required.description: When true, indicates that the user must select a value before the owning form can be submitted.
required.description_zh: 如果为 true，则指示用户必须先选择一个值，然后才能提交所属表单。
